00055 #if defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00056 #  include <intc.h>

00090 #  define ISR(func, int_grp, int_lvl)    \
00091     __attribute__((__interrupt__)) static void func (void)
00092 
00104 #  define irq_initialize_vectors()    INTC_init_interrupts()
00105 
00130 #  define irq_register_handler(func, int_num, int_lvl)                         \
00131     INTC_register_interrupt(&func, int_num,                                \
00132             TPASTE2(AVR32_INTC_INT, int_lvl))

00135 #  define ISR0(...) _Pragma(#__VA_ARGS__)
00136 #  define ISR(func, int_grp, int_lvl)                                          \
00137         ISR0(handler=int_grp, int_lvl)                                 \
00138         __interrupt static void func (void)
00139 #  define irq_initialize_vectors()                        do{ } while(0)

00145 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00146 #  define cpu_irq_enable()                             \
00147     do {                                           \
00148         barrier();                             \
00149         __builtin_csrf(AVR32_SR_GM_OFFSET);    \
00150     } while (0)
00151 #  define cpu_irq_disable()                            \
00152     do {                                           \
00153         __builtin_ssrf(AVR32_SR_GM_OFFSET);    \
00154         barrier();                             \
00155     } while (0)
00156 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00157 #  define cpu_irq_enable()     __enable_interrupt()
00158 #  define cpu_irq_disable()    __disable_interrupt()
00159 #endif
00160 
00161 typedef uint32_t irqflags_t;
00162 
00163 static inline irqflags_t cpu_irq_save(void)
00164 {
00165     irqflags_t flags;
00166 
00167     flags = sysreg_read(AVR32_SR);
00168     cpu_irq_disable();
00169 
00170     return flags;
00171 }
00172 
00173 static inline bool cpu_irq_is_enabled_flags(irqflags_t flags)
00174 {
00175     return !(flags & AVR32_SR_GM_MASK);
00176 }
00177 
00178 static inline void cpu_irq_restore(irqflags_t flags)
00179 {
00180     barrier();
00181 #if defined(__ICCAVR32__)
00182    // Barrier " __asm__ __volatile__ ("")"
00183    // Don't work with sysreg_write(AVR32_SR, flags)
00184    if( cpu_irq_is_enabled_flags(flags) ) {
00185       cpu_irq_enable();
00186    }
00187 #else
00188     sysreg_write(AVR32_SR, flags);
00189 #endif
00190     barrier();
00191 }
00192 
00193 #define cpu_irq_is_enabled()    cpu_irq_is_enabled_flags(sysreg_read(AVR32_SR))
00194 
00196 
00197 
00206 static inline bool cpu_irq_level_is_enabled_flags(irqflags_t flags,
00207         uint32_t level)
00208 {
00209     return !(flags & (1 << level));
00210 }
00211 
00221 #define cpu_irq_level_is_enabled(level)                                  \
00222     cpu_irq_level_is_enabled_flags(sysreg_read(AVR32_SR),             \
00223             TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, level, M_OFFSET))
00224 
00225 #if defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__DOXYGEN__)
00226 
00233 #  define cpu_irq_enable_level(level)                                    \
00234     do {                                                             \
00235         barrier();                                               \
00236         __builtin_csrf(TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, level, M_OFFSET));    \
00237     } while (0)
00238 
00246 #  define cpu_irq_disable_level(level)                                   \
00247     do {                                                             \
00248         __builtin_ssrf(TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, level, M_OFFSET));    \
00249         barrier();                                               \
00250     } while (0)
00251 
00252 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00253 #  define cpu_irq_enable_level(level)                                          \
00254     do {                                                                   \
00255         barrier();                                                     \
00256         __clear_status_flag(TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, level, M_OFFSET));     \
00257     } while(0)
00258 #  define cpu_irq_disable_level(level)                                         \
00259     do {                                                                   \
00260         __set_status_flag(TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, level, M_OFFSET));       \
00261         barrier();                                                     \
00262     } while (0)
00263 #endif

00275 #define Disable_global_interrupt()           cpu_irq_disable()
00276 #define Is_global_interrupt_enabled()        cpu_irq_is_enabled()
00277

00279 #define Disable_interrupt_level(level)       cpu_irq_disable_level(level)
00280 #define Is_interrupt_level_enabled(level)    cpu_irq_level_is_enabled(level)

00291 #define AVR32_ENTER_CRITICAL_REGION()                                          \
00292     {                                                                      \
00293         Bool global_interrupt_enabled = Is_global_interrupt_enabled(); \
00294         Disable_global_interrupt();
00295 
00302 #define AVR32_LEAVE_CRITICAL_REGION()                                          \
00303         if (global_interrupt_enabled) Enable_global_interrupt();       \
00304     }
